detail_desc: Short jersey dress with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Polo-neck jumper in a textured knit with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Waist belt in imitation suede and imitation leather with a decorative metal chain at the front and elastic with a metal fastener at the back. Width 4 cm.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist and a detachable braided belt in imitation suede. Zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Wide maxi skirt in a patterned weave with a concealed zip at the back. Lined with a short underskirt.
Dress in tulle with sequins and beaded embroidery at the top, concealed buttons at the back and wide shoulder straps layered with puff sleeves that can be pulled over the shoulders. Lined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned viscose weave with frills., V-neck and a wrapover front with concealed buttons and ties at one side, and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.

Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Straight-cut, calf-length kaftan in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Visible seam down the back and high slits in the sides. Unlined.

prod_name: TD Hugo slim fit Stretch PQ
detail_desc: Shirt in a stretch premium cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Shaping seams at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a gathered seam at the top and concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short, straight-cut dress in a patterned crêpe weave with long sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Unlined hood, text print on the front and raw, roll edges around the sleeves and hem.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Fitted jacket in fast-drying, thermal fleece with a drawstring hood and zip down the front. Mesh-lined side pockets with a zip, and thumbholes at the cuffs.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist with wide elastication.
Straight-cut T-shirt in a relaxed fit made from airy linen jersey.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Long dress in an airy weave with shimmering spots embroidered in glittery thread, an opening and button at the back of the neck, small frilled collar and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Elasticated seam and flounce at the waist, and a flounce at the hem. Short woven underdress.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Waterproof boots with reflective details. Soft pile linings, fleece insoles and chunky soles.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Loose-knit jumper in tape yarn. Deep neckline at the back with a twisted detail, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Trousers in a soft knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs with narrow, ribbed trims at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a printed front and round neckline with a narrow trim.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar and button placket.
Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with pleats at the front, a fake fly with a button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Shirt jacket in sturdy twill with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, sleeves with a slit and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Monkstraps with toe caps, a front fastening with a concealed elastic gore and adjustable metal buckles at the side. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and full feet.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Sandals in mesh with imitation leather details. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front and a small loop at the back. Scuba linings, cotton insoles and sturdy soles with a good grip.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed shawl collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair.
Flip-flops with glittery foot straps and low platform soles. Height of soles approx. 3 cm.

Set with a top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Round-necked top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Unicorn fancy dress costume. Sleeveless top section in brushed jersey at the front. Lightly padded bottom section with a head, legs and shimmering hooves. Padded, shimmering wings and a faux fur mane and tail.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Bandeau bra in smocked cotton jersey with a small overlocked frill trim top and bottom and no fasteners.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top. Seam at the waist with a wide, pleated waistband at the front and elastication at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with pleats and covered buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Double-breasted coat in a felted wool blend with wide notch lapels, concealed fastening at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 2-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Slides with open toes, pile crossover straps at the top, imitation suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Cable-knit hat with a faux fur pompom.
Sleeveless dress with a cotton jersey top and skirt in woven fabric. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative press-studs, zipped side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and modal blend with a high, ribbed collar, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Hi-top trainers in woven fabric with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in airy linen jersey with short flounced sleeves and a deep V-neck with buttons at the top.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and medium coverage at the back.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in a soft, rib knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit in one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wide, ribbed neckline and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, overlocked edges around the armholes and hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, funnel collar with a drawstring and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Shorts in soft twill. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, a fake fly, front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-stud fastenings, and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a leather appliqué, long sleeves with press-stud cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif. Round neckline, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slim legs.
Shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a regular waist and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener. Diagonal front pockets and legs with a slit and frill trim at the hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with reversible sequins on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless maxi dress in jersey and lace with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist.
Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs with two pendants. Adjustable length of approx. 42-50 cm.
